<br>

Welcome to the course website for the Summer Prep Bootcamp (SPB) offered by the [Department of Statistical Sciences](https://www.statistics.utoronto.ca) (DoSS) at the University of Toronto.  Important information related to the bootcamp will be posted on this website.

__Overview__

This three-week bootcamp is designed to get incoming graduate students up to speed on foundational mathematical, statistical, and computing concepts in a low pressure environment to prepare for coursework in the upcoming semester.  

<br>
The course will take place on Monday through Friday between July 11 and July 29 from 10 am to 3:30 pm.  

<br>
The schedule may be found [here](schedule.html).
